title: Bugsplat when trying to launch the launcher.
body:
First of all, it seems normal, then it shows the "Another instance of the launcher is running, terminate it?" error, then i clicked yes, it just shows a bugsplat error. also i see that the usual processes keep running in the background. so what should i do?
(plz no reinstall.)

replies.body:
Most of the time, this happens due to the Client missing specific system permissions that it relies on to run properly. I recommend ensuring these administrative privileges have been assigned using our [permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=A4piEasl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-02T17:23:10.615+0000)
>
> Most of the time, this happens due to the Client missing specific system permissions that it relies on to run properly. I recommend ensuring these administrative privileges have been assigned using our [permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)
>  
> Let me know if those steps caused any change.

hmmmm.... but
before i try those ill attach some pictures, hoping they would help in the investigation.
http://imgur.com/ylw7syh
and
http://imgur.com/ZNqMjLR

Ah, right. Thanks for providing those screenshots. Given the context and specific areas where the bugsplats are pointing to, I'd actually like you to work through [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions.

If your issue persists, please let me know.
http://imgur.com/h60Od5P is this good? i tried to force redownload the patcher and now its like this :D
